pull.title: random: only use getentropy on openbsd
pull.body: Follow-up from #10335. I can confirm that this fixes my issue when building against a new glibc + old linux headers for back-compat.

events.message: random: only use getentropy on openbsd

events.body: Tested on OpenBSD that getentropy() is still used. ACK 077d01f

comments.body: hmm? I don't see any reference for that. Afaik everything for osx is just a wrapper around /dev/[u]random anyway.
Ignore the above. See discussion in #10301.
